title: Refund?
body:
Basically, my friend and I were thinking of making alternate accounts where we only play a specific champion (Me playing Yasuo, him Aurelion Sol). I bought the RP to gift said accounts the 2 champions, but as I was gifting I realized that I sent both of the champions to one account instead of just one to each. Now, I have done research in to the way the refunds work, and I know you can't use tokens to refund gifts (I don't have anymore tokens anyway) but I feel like this deserves some kind of refund. I have been a member of this community for approximately 3 years, and I have bought RP multiple times. But I legitimately clicked on the wrong button, and I haven't used Aurelion Sol on that account at all, so I haven't taken advantage of this situation or anything, but the idea of getting another batch of RP because I bought a champion I'm not going to use on that account by accident is pretty troublesome.

This is a boards post, so I'll be lucky if a Riot Employee responds, but maybe if enough people respond we could get some attention. I might just be a spoiled brat in this situation, but I truly believe that there should be some sort of acception for things like these.

replies.body:
You're correct, we normally don't do refunds for Gifts as per our [**Refund Policy**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ). However, we may see if there's something we can do if you write a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in and link this post in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
